title: Mobile App Developer
jobDescription:
Day in the life / Job Roles Responsibilities

  • End-to-end ownership of the Process, starting from various Research methods, Persona mapping, Architectures and Journey Maps to high-fidelity mockups and prototypes to usability testing. Along with the end users of your projects/products, you would be interacting with Business, Market Research, and Technology teams to map the why, what and who of the assignment.

  • Coordinate with Business, UX Research and Product Development teams to set standards, style guides, expectations, timelines, human capital allocation, resource allocation, and benchmarks. Excellence in Execution remains Vivify Healthcare s mantra, and you shall be accountable for excellent customer experience

  • Leading and mentoring a team and being responsible for their development during the tenure of Vivify Healthcare. You shall, therefore, be required to be up-to-date with global trends, best practices and new techniques and, subsequently, educate the team.

  • Are able and interested in being part of a geographically-distributed, culturally diverse team dedicated to delivering quality work. You should find joy and be extraordinarily comfortable and effective in a non-hierarchical environment.

  • Can constantly learn and unlearn, willing to share/teach, and are not afraid of experiments and change.

  • Have a green outlook and care about the environment.

  • Flexible to work with India and US time zones.

  • Are available to join full time.

  • Conduct research and deconstruct our users digital interactions and habits.

  • Come up with UI and UX strategies based on our target goals.

  • Understand the limitations of our tech stack and business model and provide technical advice wherever necessary.

  • Ability to innovatively add new components to existing User interface

  • Ability to customize components/libraries and adapt them to the requirements

  • Ability to build reusable components



    • Qualifications

    Must-have skills

    Only those candidates may apply who:

  • Have 2 + Years in Mobile Apps Development , and are looking for a long-term position. Experience in Health Care digital products and in Flutter is a plus.

  • Have two or more iOS/Android apps developed with Flutter. Either deployed on the AppStore/Google Play or available on Github

  • Have a strong obsession with developing delightful user experiences, product features, and documentation, through a core DNA built on innovation, design thinking, and UX.

  • Have proven hands-on capabilities working in a fast-paced environment with enthusiastic and inquisitive members. You would have sharp attention to detail, smart decision-making ability, and be able to manage time and resources effectively and efficiently.

  • Have proficiency in written and oral English communication. You shall be reading, writing, analyzing, interpreting, negotiating, and presenting business correspondence with groups of managers, vendors, customers, and other stakeholders.

  • Are proactively analytical, problem-solving, and calculative aptitude.

  • A portfolio that demonstrates both JavaScript proficiency and understanding of SOLID design principles (plugins, node packages, etc.).

  • Expert knowledge of CSS, CSS extension languages (Less, Sass), and CSS preprocessor tools.

  • Expert knowledge of HTML5 and its best practices.

  • Java/Swift/Dart experience;

  • Understanding of Android Keyboard API;

  • A history of deconstructing user behavior to create an improved experience for users, showcased in the form of blog posts, articles, screencasts, etc.

  • Proficiency using Git version control.

  • Proficiency using the command line.

  • Excellent Debugging skills using browser console and chrome dev tools

  • Having Knowledge / Work Experience for working on tools / technologies and libraries , i.e.

  • Cross platform app development with React Native and/or Flutter is must.

  • Mobile app deployment for Android and iOS

  • Modern JavaScript : Classes, promises, async/await, generators, modules

  • custom validations for Forms

  • Frontend State management when using Dart, React, Angular 9/9+ etc. for building apps

  • design forms, wizards, flows with good user experience
